metadata.title: CVE-2017-14407 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A stack-based buffer over-read was discovered in filterYule ingain_analysis.c in MP3Gain version 1.5.2. The vulnerability causes anapplication crash, which leads to remote denial of service.

criterions.comment: mp3gain: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
